tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  incident_location VARCHAR(255),
  incident_description TEXT,
  investigation_status ENUM('Pending', 'Ongoing', 'Resolved')
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  reporter_name VARCHAR(100),
  incident_description TEXT,
  security_level ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High')
);

CREATE TABLE InvestigationFindings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  investigator_name VARCHAR(100),
  findings TEXT,
  action_taken TEXT,
  conclusion TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    reporter VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE InvestigationFindings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    investigator VARCHAR(50),
    finding_description TEXT,
    finding_date DATE,
    remediation_plan TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    incident_date DATE NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE investigation_findings (
    finding_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT NOT NULL,
    finding_date DATE NOT NULL,
    investigator VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    findings TEXT NOT NULL,
    recommendation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE investigation_findings (
   finding_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   incident_id UUID,
   investigator_name VARCHAR,
   finding_description TEXT,
   finding_status VARCHAR
);
